main event: On November 6, 1957, an oblong object was sighted hovering and rotating at an altitude of approximately 1,000 feet in Durham, N.C.
interesting points: The object was the size of a baseball and had a bright light on the front., The sighting lasted for 3 minutes., An additional circular silvery object was reported about 600 feet above the ground, seen moving toward the northeast., The second object appeared to hover before quickly disappearing., Both sightings concluded with possible explanations including a balloon or aircraft.
sighted object: oblong object with a bright light and a circular silvery object
witness description: the sighting involved visual observations only
